title: U.S. says ready to give India technical aid to build strategic oil reserve
text:
U.S. says ready to give India technical aid to build strategic oil reserve

Commodities 7 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 10:40)

© Reuters. U.S. says ready to give India technical aid to build strategic oil reserve NEW DELHI, Oct 14 (Reuters) - The United States is willing to forge a comprehensive partnership with India in the energy sector, U.S. Ambassador to India Kenneth Juster said on Monday. Juster said Washington is willing to provide technical assistance to help India set up strategic petroleum reserves. India's oil imports from the United States jumped sharply in 2018.

U.S. says ready to give India technical aid to build strategic oil reserve
description: U.S. says ready to give India technical aid to build strategic oil reserve
